app.title: Kronilo
app.subtitle: Dead Simple Cron Translator
app.description: Instantly convert between cron expressions and natural language.

cronInput.label: Cron Expression
cronInput.infoTooltip: */5 * * * * → every 5 minutes (minute, hour, day of month, month, day of week)

naturalLanguageInput.label: Natural Language
naturalLanguageInput.placeholder: e.g., "run once a week on Thursday" — Works best in English, French, German, Spanish, or Italian. Support for other languages may vary.
naturalLanguageInput.ariaLabel: Enter schedule description in natural language

translation.title: Translation:
translation.placeholder: Enter a cron expression to see the translation

nextRuns.title: Next 5 Runs:
nextRuns.placeholder: Enter a valid cron expression to see the next execution times
nextRuns.ambiguousSchedule: This cron expression specifies both a day of the month and a day of the week. Different cron implementations may interpret this differently. For clarity, consider using only one or the other.

naturalLanguage.title: Natural Language Schedule
naturalLanguage.inputPlaceholder: e.g., "run once a week on Thursday" — Works best in English, French, German, and Spanish. Support for other languages may vary.
naturalLanguage.unexpectedError: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
naturalLanguage.rateLimitedMsg: You have reached the rate limit. Please try again later.
naturalLanguage.rateLimitError: You have reached the rate limit. Please try again later.

errors.networkError: Network error. Please check your connection.
errors.rateLimitExceeded: Rate limit exceeded. Please try again later.
errors.somethingWrong: Something went wrong. Please try again.
errors.inputEmpty: Input cannot be empty. Please enter a schedule in natural language.
errors.translationFailed: Could not translate input to a valid cron expression after several attempts.

errors.noExpression: No cron expression provided. Please enter a cron schedule like '0 12 * * 1'.
errors.invalidFieldCount: A cron expression must have 5 fields (minute hour day month weekday), but got {{count}}. Example: '0 12 * * 1'
errors.invalidField: Invalid {{fieldName}}: "{{field}}". Value is not valid for this field (allowed: {{fieldRange}})
errors.missingValue: Missing value. Please provide a value for this field.
errors.invalidCharacters: Contains invalid characters. Only numbers, ',', '-', '*', and '/' are allowed.
errors.invalidStep: Step value after '/' must be a positive integer.
errors.invalidRangeFormat: Range must be in the form 'start-end', e.g. 1-5.
errors.rangeStartGreater: Range start ({{start}}) should not be greater than end ({{end}}).
errors.dayOfWeekRange: Day of week must be between 0-7 (0 or 7 = Sunday).
errors.invalidDayOfWeekValues: Invalid value(s): {{invalids}}. Allowed range for day of week: 0-7 (0 or 7 = Sunday).
errors.valueOutOfRange: Value {{num}} is out of range for {{fieldName}} ({{fieldRange}}).

donation.title: Support Kronilo
donation.message: Kronilo is a free, open-source tool that respects your privacy—no ads, no trackers, no account required.
donation.messageExtended: If it saved you time, please consider buying me a coffee. Every little bit helps keep Kronilo alive and ad-free.
